DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect proton pump inhibitor ( PPIs ) total number reflux episodes distal esophagus measure impedance patient without gastroesophageal reflux disease ( GERD ) base 24-hour pH test . In addition change acidity refluxate , investigator hypothesize PPIs also reduce total number reflux episode due anti-secretory effect .
